body:
Hiya!
After much time away from this server, I decided to join again and see some old friends :) This server has changed so much :O You might remember my old username: AwesomeGirl924. I won't be playing too much bc schoool, but I'll be on during the weekends and if you see me in game don't hesitate to say hello :3.
Anyways, I just wanted to say hi also if you have any questions for me that's cool since this is an AMA and all :D

title: You may remember me... [AMA]
